data.title: Transit: Radiative-transfer code for planetary atmospheres
data.name: transit

evidence: README mentions releases: "To obtain the Transit code, download the latest stable version from the releases page (TBD). Alternatively, clone the repository to your local machine with the following terminal commands.  First, cre"
"Transit calculates the transmission or emission spectrum of a planetary atmosphere with application to extrasolar-planet transit and eclipse observations"

"To obtain the Transit code, download the latest stable version from the releases page (TBD). Alternatively, clone the repository to your local machine with the following terminal commands. ... git clone --recursive https://github.com/exosports/transit transit/"
